title: Outlaws of the Airwaves: The Rise of Pirate Radio Station WBAD
itunes:title: Outlaws of the Airwaves: The Rise of Pirate Radio Station WBAD
description: Pirate radio station WBAD in New York was a beloved source for fans of underground, unsanitized hip-hop in the 1990s, but how high could this illegal operation fly while also staying under the radar?
itunes:summary: Pirate radio station WBAD in New York was a beloved source for fans of underground, unsanitized hip-hop in the 1990s, but how high could this illegal operation fly while also staying under the radar?
media:description: Pirate radio station WBAD in New York was a beloved source for fans of underground, unsanitized hip-hop in the 1990s, but how high could this illegal operation fly while also staying under the radar?
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
